_isVisibleBeforeCompletion.title: Show before assessment completion
_isVisibleBeforeCompletion.description: Controls whether this component will be visible or hidden prior to the assessment having been completed

_setCompletionOn.title: Completion criterion
_setCompletionOn.description: Set to 'pass' to have the component mark as completed only if the learner passed the associated assessment

_resetType.title: Reset type
_resetType.description: Set to 'inherit' to use the same reset type as the assessment. Set to 'hard' to have the component's completion reset when the assessment is reset, set to 'soft' if you don't want completion to be reset

_assessmentId.title: Linked assessment ID
_assessmentId.description: This is the unique name of the assessment for which results should be displayed. If you only have one assessment you can leave this blank

feedback.title: Retry feedback
feedback.description: This text is displayed only when more attempts remain. You can use the following variables: {{attemptsSpent}}, {{attempts}}, {{attemptsLeft}}, {{{score}}}, {{{maxScore}}}

_routeToAssessment.title: Redirect to assessment on retry
_routeToAssessment.description: When enabled, this will take the user back to the assessment when the "Retry Assessment" button is clicked

_completionBody.title: Default feedback
_completionBody.description: This text overwrites the standard body attribute upon completion of the assessment. It may make use of the following variables: {{attemptsSpent}}, {{attempts}}, {{attemptsLeft}}, {{{score}}}, {{{maxScore}}}. {{{feedback}}}, representing the feedback assigned to the appropriate band, is also allowed
_completionBody.default:
This component you're reading is a results component.
You have finished the assessment.
You scored {{{score}}} out of {{{maxScore}}}. {{{feedback}}}

_score.title: Minimum score
_score.description: Enter a value representing the raw score or percentage for the start of the range

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: This text will be displayed to the learner when the learner's score falls within this band's range

_allowRetry.title: Allow retry
_allowRetry.description: Determines whether the learner will be allowed to re-attempt the assessment. If not set, the learner will not be allowed to retry the assessment regardless of any remaining attempts

_classes.title: Custom article classes
_classes.description: Classes to be applied to the containing article. Allows for custom styling based on the band the learner's score falls into
